script:
1.3
foxBox (foxUnit01), Please also view Readme for credit
http://www.memes.no/88flak/
Read the Readme for more info! Click the "View Readme" button in FLMM to do so. Please read the options list right now before activating, located in the Readme, for information on options.
Note 1: If you get a startup crash, go to "Tools > Open Saved Games Folder", and delete all files in the "Singleplayer" folder (back them up first if you need).
Note 2: Although Flak has Open SP support, it is highly recommended to run a multiplayer server instead - refer to the SP Mode FAQ in the readme. It will explain how to set up a multiplayer server if you've never done one before, even if you don't have a network / internet access on the computer you're playing on.
Note 3: Be sure to check out the 88 Flak Soundtrack! If you're sick of Freelancer's default music, check it out at http://www.memes.no/88flak/downloads/beta/88flakv127_st.zip.flmod
Note 4: Read that damn readme!
And lastly, thank you for downloading the mod! Pay us a visit! ~88 Flak community, http://www.memes.no/88flak/
;Reserved Option ID Codes ;0xy - x = category, starting at 0 (0 for essential, 1 for graphics, etc.) ; y = option num, starting at 1 ;10x - x = DBG Options, starting at 1 ;100 - Blank Line
;Padding Start
;Padding End
event = object_destruction, -0.001250
event = object_destruction, -0.125000
addon = stealth_hf_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
;addon = stealth_hf_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
addon = nomad_fighter_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
;addon = nomad_fighter_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
addon = nomad_gunboat_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
;addon = nomad_gunboat_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
addon = nomad_battleship_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
;addon = nomad_battleship_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
addon = osiris_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
;addon = osiris_cloak, HpCloak01, 1
rotation_inertia = 1000000000000, 62500000000000, 62500000000000
rotation_inertia = 62500000000000, 62500000000000, 62500000000000
steering_torque = 12500000000000, 100000000000000, 100000000000000
steering_torque = 100000000000000, 100000000000000, 100000000000000
steering_torque = 6250000000000, 50000000000000, 50000000000000
steering_torque = 50000000000000, 50000000000000, 50000000000000
;Sych with Option 003 and AI Companion
;libcurl.dll ;GLS Workaround ;gls_workaround.dll ;GLS Workaround
libcurl.dll ;GLS Workaround activated by FLMM Options gls_workaround.dll ;GLS Workaround activated by FLMM Options
rotation_inertia = 1000000000000, 62500000000000, 62500000000000
rotation_inertia = 62500000000000, 62500000000000, 62500000000000
steering_torque = 12500000000000, 100000000000000, 100000000000000
steering_torque = 100000000000000, 100000000000000, 100000000000000
steering_torque = 6250000000000, 50000000000000, 50000000000000
steering_torque = 50000000000000, 50000000000000, 50000000000000
;Sych with Option 001 and AI Companion
[;HUDShift] ;16:9
[HUDShift] ;16:9 - Activated by FLMM
[;HUDShift] ;15:9
[HUDShift] ;15:9 - Activated by FLMM
[;HUDShift] ;16:10
[HUDShift] ;16:10 - Activated by FLMM
[;HUDShift] ;5:4
[HUDShift] ;5:4 - Activated by FLMM
[;HUDShift] ;5:4 Alt
[HUDShift] ;5:4 Alt - Activated by FLMM
effects = Fx\effect_types.ini ; needs to be before effects.ini
effects = Fx\effect_typeshigh.ini ; needs to be before effects.ini
FxBasicAppearance.poolSize = 1000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxRectAppearance.poolSize = 400 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxPerpAppearance.poolSize = 250 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxOrientedAppearance.poolSize = 0 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FLBeamAppearance.poolSize = 680 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 5 verts 24 indices FLDustAppearance.poolSize = 250 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 4 verts 6 indices ;---------------------- total = 2600 -------; ; FxMeshAppearance.poolSize = 500 ; generates meshes not particles; need enough of these for all tradelane rings in a system. FxParticleAppearance.poolSize = 100 ; generates effects not particles
FxBasicAppearance.poolSize = 100000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxRectAppearance.poolSize = 40000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxPerpAppearance.poolSize = 25000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxOrientedAppearance.poolSize = 0 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FLBeamAppearance.poolSize = 68000 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 5 verts 24 indices FLDustAppearance.poolSize = 25000 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 4 verts 6 indices ;---------------------- total = 260000 -------; ; FxMeshAppearance.poolSize = 50000 ; generates meshes not particles; need enough of these for all tradelane rings in a system. FxParticleAppearance.poolSize = 10000 ; generates effects not particles
effects = Fx\weapons\weapons_ale.ini
effects = Fx\weapons\weapons_alehigh.ini
effects = Fx\explosions\explosions_ale.ini
effects = Fx\explosions\explosions_alehigh.ini
effect_type = EFT_EXPLOSION_SHIP vis_effect = ku_flakcannon01_flash
effect_type = EFT_EXPLOSION_SHIP vis_effect = gf_explosion_super_flak
effect_type = EFT_EXPLOSION_SHIP vis_effect = br_flakcannon01_flash
effect_type = EFT_EXPLOSION_SHIP vis_effect = gf_explosion_super_nomad_flak
;MISSILE DEBRIS
debris_impulse = 125 debris_type = debris_missile, 1.000000 innards_debris_start_time = 0.000000 innards_debris_num = 2 innards_debris_radius = 5 innards_debris_object = simple_torpedo_debris
;TORPEDO DEBRIS
debris_impulse = 125 debris_type = debris_torpedo, 1.000000 innards_debris_start_time = 0.000000 innards_debris_num = 4 innards_debris_radius = 5 innards_debris_object = simple_torpedo_debris
;MISSILE DEBRIS

FxBasicAppearance.poolSize = 1000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxRectAppearance.poolSize = 400 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxPerpAppearance.poolSize = 250 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxOrientedAppearance.poolSize = 0 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FLBeamAppearance.poolSize = 680 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 5 verts 24 indices FLDustAppearance.poolSize = 250 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 4 verts 6 indices ;---------------------- total = 2600 -------; ; FxMeshAppearance.poolSize = 500 ; generates meshes not particles; need enough of these for all tradelane rings in a system. FxParticleAppearance.poolSize = 100 ; generates effects not particles
FxBasicAppearance.poolSize = 100000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxRectAppearance.poolSize = 40000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxPerpAppearance.poolSize = 25000 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FxOrientedAppearance.poolSize = 0 ; each particle can generate: 4 verts 6, indices FLBeamAppearance.poolSize = 68000 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 5 verts 24 indices FLDustAppearance.poolSize = 25000 ; custom app from flalchemy.dll: each particle can generate: 4 verts 6 indices ;---------------------- total = 260000 -------; ; FxMeshAppearance.poolSize = 50000 ; generates meshes not particles; need enough of these for all tradelane rings in a system. FxParticleAppearance.poolSize = 10000 ; generates effects not particles
sounds = Audio\sounds.ini ;all sfx not falling into some other category sounds = Audio\engine_sounds.ini ;engine sounds only
sounds = Audio\soundshigh.ini ;all sfx not falling into some other category sounds = Audio\engine_soundshigh.ini ;engine sounds only
maxSoundChannels = 24 ; was 30. changed for Beta -psw
maxSoundChannels = 36 ; was 30. changed for Beta -psw
;snd_effect = const_missile_homing
snd_effect = const_missile_homing
;snd_effect = const_missile_regular
snd_effect = const_missile_regular
;snd_effect = const_missile_emp
snd_effect = const_missile_emp
;snd_effect = const_torpedo
snd_effect = const_torpedo
